trans-unit.source: The TrustRelationshipInformation class contains information for a trust relationship between a pair of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"></xref> or <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: La classe TrustRelationshipInformation contiene informazioni per una relazione di trust tra una coppia di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"> </xref> o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: Obtains the name of the source <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"></xref> or <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest"></xref> objects for this trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome dell'origine <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"> </xref> o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest"> </xref> oggetti per questa relazione di trust.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of the source <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"></xref> or <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest"></xref> objects for this trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: Una stringa che contiene il nome dell'origine <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"> </xref> o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest"> </xref> oggetti per questa relazione di trust.

trans-unit.source: Obtains the name of the target <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"></xref> or <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest"></xref> objects for this trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome della destinazione <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"> </xref> o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest"> </xref> oggetti per questa relazione di trust.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of the target <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"></xref> or <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest"></xref> objects for this trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: Una stringa che contiene il nome della destinazione <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"> </xref> o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest"> </xref> oggetti per questa relazione di trust.

trans-unit.source: Obtains the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection"></xref> objects for this trust relationship relative to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"></xref> or <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest"></xref> objects that created the trust.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection"> </xref> oggetti per questa relazione relativo a di trust di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"> </xref> o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest"> </xref> gli oggetti che ha creato la relazione di trust.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection"></xref> value for this trust relationship relative to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"></xref> or <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest"></xref> objects that created the trust.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection"> </xref> valore per questa relazione di trust rispetto al <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"> </xref> o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest"> </xref> gli oggetti che ha creato la relazione di trust.

trans-unit.source: Obtains the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustType"></xref> object of the trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustType"> </xref> oggetto della relazione di trust.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustType"></xref> value that represents the type of the trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustType"> </xref> valore che rappresenta il tipo della relazione di trust.
